pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, March 6, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Inuit-Crown Partnership Committee meeting.

James Michael Flaherty Building
90 Elgin Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for opening remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:45 p.m.
